StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherBuiltGalacticAchievement
StringTable.String: We've heard rumors that the %s have built the %s Galactic Achievement.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherPutStarbaseInTerritory
StringTable.String: %s has built a starbase in our territory.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherWithdrewFromUP
StringTable.String: %s has withdrawn from the United Planets.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_UPResolutionExpired
StringTable.String: The %s United Planets Resolution has expired.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherResearchedVictoryTech
StringTable.String: %s has researched %s in preparation for a tech victory.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherGotMajorityAscensionCrystals
StringTable.String: %s has captured the majority of ascension crystals and can seek ascension victory.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherReachedAscensionPoints
StringTable.String: %s has gathered enough aura points to win an ascension victory.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_AgreementExpired
StringTable.String: One of your agreements with %s has expired.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_AgreementCancelled
StringTable.String: %s has cancelled an agreement with you.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_ShipyardCannotManufactureShip
StringTable.String: %s is no longer repeatedly manufacturing %s because you have run out of %s.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_GalacticEventActive_Duration
StringTable.String: The galactic event %s is active for %ld more turns.
